current.home_keywords: Buy and send bouquet of flowers online in Los Angeles (Santa Monica), flowers delivery near me.

settings.text: Subscribe to our newsletter and get 10% off your first purchase

settings.content: SAME DAY DELIVERY! FREE DELIVERY WITHIN 5 MILES
DON'T MISS OUR SIMPLE COLLECTION SALE. End in [countdown]. Hurry Up!! [icon_arrow]

settings.html:
<script type="application/ld+json">
{
	"@context": "https://schema.org",
	"@type": "Florist",

	"image": [

       ],
	"email": "info@bloomboom.us",
	"telePhone": "+1(424) 208 1816",

	"paymentAccepted": [ "cash", "check", "credit card", "invoice", "paypal" ],

			"Monday",

			"Thursday",
			"Friday"

} </script>

settings.text: Go kalles this summer with this vintage navy and white striped v-neck t-shirt from the Nike. Perfect for pairing with denim and white kicks for a stylish kalles vibe.
